body_html:
I agree with @apaszke on this. We shouldn’t limit our much widely used Python API by the constraint of c++, especially when the c++ API is much less used, still experimental (i.e. c++ API can be changed much more easily w/o considering BC), and already different with the Python API in many ways.
…
On Mon, Jul 16, 2018 at 18:31 gchanan ***@***.***> wrote: This seems to boil down to whether you prefer being concise or having the semantics be clearer/more consistent. I prefer the later. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
I agree with @apaszke on this. We shouldn’t limit our much widely used
Python API by the constraint of c++, especially when the c++ API is much
less used, still experimental (i.e. c++ API can be changed much more easily
w/o considering BC), and already different with the Python API in many
ways.

On Mon, Jul 16, 2018 at 18:31 gchanan <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> This seems to boil down to whether you prefer being concise or having the
> semantics be clearer/more consistent. I prefer the later.
>
> —
